name: OPL2 FM Audio File
summary: Learn about .D01 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: OPL2 FM synthesizers were used to play music for video games in the 1980s and 1990s. Yamaha produced several FM chip types along with the OPL2 (YM3812) chip, such as OPL (YM3526), OPL3 (YMF262), and OPL4 (YMF278B) chips. Winamp with the Ganbatte! plug-in installed allows users to emulate OPL2 audio chips in Windows.

description: A D01 file is an audio file generated by the OPL2 FM synthesizer. It contains music from an OPL2 FM synthesizer that can be played by an emulator.
